description: WizeHire is an award-winning platform that helps small businesses grow with a better way to hire. We are currently assisting a local customer source top talent to fill their Sales Account Manager position in Irvine, CA, US. Account Manager - Superior Home Buyers | Orange County, CA Are you ready to shape the future of real estate investment? Join Superior Home Buyers as an Account Manager and make a significant impact by connecting with high-power investors, negotiating deals, and driving innovative outcomes. About Us: At Superior Home Buyers, we are visionaries in the real estate industry, dedicated to creating opportunities and achieving outstanding results. Our dynamic team is committed to excellence and innovation, making us a leader in the market. Role Overview: As an Account Manager, you will play a crucial role in our success. Your outgoing personality and persuasive skills will help you build strong relationships with clients, identify new investment opportunities, and negotiate deals that benefit all parties. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and love connecting with people, this role is perfect for you.
